abstract: A former frontman in Asia for the American casino magnate Sheldon Adelson, along with tens of millions of dollars in payments that the Las Vegas Sands Corporation made through him in China, are the focus of a wide-ranging federal investigation into potential bribery of foreign officials, according to people with direct knowledge of the inquiries.

headline.main: Casino Mogul's Former Frontman in China Comes Under Scrutiny
